hero.title: Discover and Share Cloud Drive Resources
hero.description:
panShare is a resource sharing platform supporting Baidu Pan, Aliyun Drive, Quark Drive and more.
Easily discover, share, and manage cloud drive resources.
hero.tip: Supporting multiple mainstream cloud drive platforms

introduce.title: What is panShare?
introduce.label: Introduction
introduce.description: panShare is a platform focused on cloud drive resource sharing, making quality resources easier to discover and access.

items.title: Multi-Platform Support
items.description: Support for Baidu Pan, Aliyun Drive, Quark Drive, Xunlei Drive, 115 Drive and more.

items.title: Easy Sharing
items.description: One-click submit share links and extraction codes to quickly share resources with others.

items.title: Resource Management
items.description: Clear categorization and search functionality to easily find the resources you need.

items.title: Community Driven
items.description: Users participate together, sharing quality resources and building a resource community.

benefits.title: Why Choose panShare
benefits.label: Advantages
benefits.description: We are committed to providing the best cloud drive resource sharing experience.

items.title: Rich Resources
items.description: Aggregating quality cloud drive resources shared by users, covering learning, tools, entertainment and more.

items.title: Easy to Use
items.description: Clear and intuitive interface design. Browse without registration, login to submit and copy share info.

items.title: Safe and Reliable
items.description: All shared content is reviewed to ensure resource quality and security.

usage.title: How to Use panShare
usage.description: Three steps to start your cloud drive resource journey:

items.title: Browse and Discover
items.description: Browse cloud drive shares on the homepage, use search and filters to find what you need.

items.title: Login
items.description: Register or login to your account to unlock full features.

items.title: Copy and Use
items.description: One-click copy share links and extraction codes, go to the corresponding cloud drive to get resources.

items.title: Share and Contribute
items.description: Have quality resources? Submit a share and let more people benefit.

features.title: Platform Features
features.description: Practical features designed for cloud drive resource sharing.

items.title: Expiration Notice

items.title: User Submission

items.title: Free
items.description: Browse and Use

items.question: What is panShare?
items.answer: panShare is a cloud drive resource sharing platform where users can discover and share resource links from various cloud drive platforms. We support Baidu Pan, Aliyun Drive, Quark Drive and other mainstream platforms.

items.question: Is panShare free to use?
items.answer: Yes. Browsing and using share information on panShare is completely free. We are committed to providing users with a convenient resource discovery experience.

items.question: How do I submit my share?
items.answer: After logging in, click the 'Submit Share' button, fill in the share title, description, link and extraction code to submit. Submitted content needs to be reviewed before it will be displayed.

items.question: Which cloud drive platforms are supported?
items.answer: Currently we support Baidu Pan, Aliyun Drive, Quark Drive, Xunlei Drive, 115 Drive and other custom types. We will continue to add more platform support.

items.question: Do shared resources expire?
items.answer: Some cloud drive share links may have expiration times. We clearly mark the expiration time on resource cards to help you judge if the resource is still valid.

items.question: How is share content quality ensured?
items.answer: All user-submitted shares need to be reviewed by administrators to ensure content quality and compliance. We also welcome users to report problematic resources.

cta.title: Start Exploring Cloud Drive Resources
cta.description: Discover and share quality cloud drive resources on panShare.
